oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Program, "See Our Boys Depart"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Program of events to honor Rhea County men leaving for Camp Gordon, Georgia, "in response to the Nation's call to arms." The Farewell Patriotic Demonstration included songs, prayers, public addresses and a parade. Names of the boys headed to basic training are listed at left. Item was part of the estate of Fred Walker Abel, Dayton, Rhea County, Tennessee, whose name appears near the bottom of the list. He served in Co. F, 322th Inf. Regt., 81st Div.
